item.title: Innovation Works: Capturing China Internet Opportunity
item.description: The Chinese Internet has evolved into a new era. During this new era, opportunities should be considered the most valuable. Dr. Kai-fu Lee will describe the exciting opportunities and important trends of the Chinese internet. Dr. Lee will al
item.author: RainnieZhou

item.title: 百度总裁 李彦宏先生哥伦比亚大学演讲
item.description: 时逢中华人民共和国成立六十周年，中国经济继续迅速稳健发展并急需大量人才，我们特邀请海外留学并成功创业的典范，全球知名的百度公司创始人、董事长兼首席执行官 李彦宏先生
item.author: RainnieZhou

item.title: The Challenges of China’s Banking Reform
item.description: Dr. JIANG Jianqing is the Chairman and President of Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC), the largest commercial bank in the world. Dr. Jiang will talk about China banking reform, in particular, on topics which the world concerns m
item.author: RainnieZhou

item.title: The Impacts of Financial Crisis on China
item.description: Mr. Ding Wei is Executive Chairman of Corporate Finance Committee of CICC. Mr. Ding will speak at Columbia University to share his opinions of the current financial crisis.
item.author: RainnieZhou

item.title: The Development of Chinese Financial Market: the Transition,
item.description: Mr. Ma Weihua is the President and CEO of China Merchants Bank (CMB). Mr. Ma will share his opinions on the development of Chinese financial market: the transition, challenge and opportunity.
item.author: RainnieZhou

item.title: Forum Overview

item.author: RainnieZhou
